author: Riva Gold
title: Political Uncertainty in Italy, Spain Roils Markets
text:
Euro below $1.16 for first time this year Italian 10-year yields jump above 3% Banks were among the biggest decliners in the U.S. The Dow Jones Industrial Average tumbled more than 400 points as investors worried whether political turmoil in Italy could unravel a fragile European economy and cause global growth to sputter.
Italian President Sergio Mattarellaâ€™s decision on Sunday to block the formation of a euroskeptic government revived longstanding worries about the broader stability of the eurozone and a political crisis...
